title: Great material design interface, but very limited
comment: Doesn't recognize vitamins, supplements, etc. Doesn't support reminders for getting refills.  I'll stick with MediSafe.

Hi Mark,  thank you so much for your opinion! This is an open project, and we are delighted to receive user requests. Stock management is one of the ideas we have in mind, and it would be great if you could open an "issue" in our page and describe a bit more what you are looking for, to help us keep improving! https://github.com/citiususc/calendula
